website_summaries.verdict: A solid option for Android users who want a Fast Charge enabled device.
pros: Features Fast Charge technology (works only with compatible devices) and a sleek design
Devices can be charged upright or flat
Rubber nubs underneath keep the unit from sliding around and a compact design makes it easy to place the pad almost anywhere
It's also very easy to set up
cons: Pricey, and the LED lights are very bright, making it a poor choice for bedroom use

customer_reviews.title: Beware: Not eligible for warranty in the US.
customer_reviews.text: The product works fine as advertised with my galaxy buds and s9+. That said, the sellers here are selling a product for the Latin American market, because of that you cannot register this in the US or UK. The only warranty you have here is Amazon's return policy. Be aware before you buy and decide if you're fine rolling the dice.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: it's significantly faster than fast wireless 1.0, but heats up very quickly and way too warm.
customer_reviews.text: the charger keeps my note 10+ at a constant 103-105 degrees while charging, compared to an older 3rd party fast wireless 1.0 charger that's in the low 90s. this extra heat is getting me worried about the battery's health and the table. the table is quite warm after charging, and i wouldn't be surprised if it creates a light burned mark on the wooden surface a few months down. pros: very fast wireless charging matte finish looks nice cons: usb c cable is way too short, about 3' much warmer than fast wireless 1.0 expensive! although i got it at $57, still expensive.
customer_reviews.author: JYL

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly Useful
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit hesitant to buy this considering the price, but I'm so glad I did. I charge my gear s3 and galaxy s10+ at the same time and the charger works very well. You don't need to place either device precisely on the charger location and it still works well. I'm glad I bought it and I'd highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Bublitz

customer_reviews.title: Slow charger
customer_reviews.text: Not a fast charger, the description is incorrect! It takes over 3 hours to charge the Note 10+. Very disappointing product
customer_reviews.author: Julian

customer_reviews.title: Not Completely Compatible With Note 8
customer_reviews.text: I like how you can place the phone upward or sideways. It charges as it should, but after doing some research and speaking with Samsung the auto mode with the cooling fan won't work or even turn on for anyone running an outdated One UI. The Note 8 has One UI 1.0 and this wireless charger requires One UI 1.5 at least. Samsung stated it won't get the update either. So I advise any Note 8 users to buy the older wireless models as this is just a waste not being able to use all the features of the charger.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Styles

customer_reviews.title: newer is better
customer_reviews.text: This dual charger model is absolutely better in every way/shape/form from it's single charger predecessor. The old single wireless charger, would get very hot and sometimes fail to turn itself off. This newer charger doesn't get nearly as hot and has had no problems turning itself off when not being used. I no longer fear my charger is going to burn down my house, which is nice not having to worry about in this crazy day in age.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Myers

customer_reviews.title: Works great even with Otterbox case
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking it something I may use once in a while ,but I love it and uses it all the time. So much easier then trying to plug in the usb and possibly breaking it. Charges my Note 10 fast with my Otterbox case and all.
customer_reviews.author: Ron B.

customer_reviews.title: Save that Franklin
customer_reviews.text: Everything was smooth on Amazon's end. The product was janky first day out the box. You would have to make sure the placement is perfect to even get anything to charge. Alot of dead/low battery products in the morning if you aren't paying attention to the sensitive placement to get things to charge. After about 4 months, the larger pad doesn't work at all now. Do not buy this product. Save that Franklin, get a cheaper alternative what you wont be upset if you have to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Quinten W.

customer_reviews.title: Not able to register with Samsung
customer_reviews.text: The charger is nice, I had no problem with hooking it up and placing my phone on it. My phone is a S10 Plus. When I went to register the charger with Samsung, it kept coming back as not a valid model number. I chatted with someone from Samsung and they weren't able to register it either. I hope that doesn't mean it's not a OEM Samsung charger.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna S

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good Charging Pad
customer_reviews.text: When it comes to chargers, I usually go with the brand charger to avoid damage to my devices. And Samsung did not disappoint in this wireless charging pad. The only problem I did have with the pad is that it can be picky with my Gear S3 so I have to make sure that it is charging.
customer_reviews.author: Micki

customer_reviews.title: Great charger, multi use
customer_reviews.text: This charger is expensive, but I think it’s worth it. It can charge two items at once and does NOT have that annoying bright light that the previous stand up models have. It has a little light that is red when charging but it’s not that noticeable. I have an iPhone X and it works great! It doesn’t not charge my Apple Watch, but it was designed to charge the Samsung watch. I use the other side to charge my B&O E8 2.0 or another phone and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: YS

customer_reviews.title: Cooling fan onlyj works  with One UI v1.5 or higher
customer_reviews.text: Charges phone just fine but should state in description that the fan and turning it on/off only works with Galaxy phones running One UI version 1.5 or higher. Only found that out by reading fine print on the box it came in.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Clime

customer_reviews.title: Hot base, Hot phone!
customer_reviews.text: Fan does not work period, on any phone! Main concern using any phone case and long period charges on "all our phones" gets super heated up. Removing cases does help but still heats up enough you need that fan! $1,000 phone, battery damage... Not a risk im willing to take! Return will have to wait due to covid19. I buy a lot of products from electronics to household appliances. One time $25.00 bad experience, is the brighter side. lol. 🤷🏼‍♀️ factory defective, maybe🤞 Though I did expect higher quality, Samsung will stay my #1 to go to brand👍 I gave it ⭐⭐ because it is easy to use, stylish, sturdy and actually does charge multiple brand name phones.
customer_reviews.author: sabrina bays

customer_reviews.title: Wrong details
customer_reviews.text: There is no usb C wall charger included as description.
customer_reviews.author: nhatthien0488

customer_reviews.title: Not chargig
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this and it is blinking yellow and not charging any more, it used to be green and charge fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: MVKLA

customer_reviews.title: Recent purchaser
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fast charger. This product is high quality and makes charging Galaxy S10e less hassle. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Recent Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product turned my Pixel 3 into a brick - DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This worked fine for about 2 days and on the 3rd night I sat my Pixel 3 on the charger, confirmed that it was charging, went to sleep and when I woke up my phone was unresponsive. I've had zero issues with my Pixel 3 up until this point. No hard reset or soft reset attempts will work. My phone is a brick and the only variable is this charger. I suspect this could be a very accurately made chinese substitute instead of an actual Samsung product.
customer_reviews.author: zt_86

customer_reviews.title: Wish they came out with these sooner.
customer_reviews.text: Had tried several different brands all claiming they would work. Well, none could ever give the correct wireless charge wattage for my Galaxy S10. Finally, Samsung released this single wireless stand that changed everything. Rather than having to their Duo charger that was too big for my needs this charging stand is just the right size to hold the S10 and not take up much space when not in use. Thanks for finally coming out with a charger that can deliver max wireless charging speeds for the S10.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: No User Manual or User Guide
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to indicate how to use it. No User Manual. Called Samsung, no manual or user guide. Nothing on the Samsung website, Was given a number to call by Samsung to get a user guide, number was no good. No one at Samsung could provide a user guide. No one at seller could provide a user guide either. Nothing to indicate what the color of LED lights meant, or recommended use instructions. Other than that, I guess it is OK... Don't really know, as their is no guide/instructions anywhere....
customer_reviews.author: Tech Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible for Galaxy Watch Active 2
customer_reviews.text: Mainly use it to charge my Galaxy Watch Active 2 and Buds + headphones. Works great for the headphones on the larger pad, barely works for my watch. You have to align it absolutely perfectly every time, and if you touch the band or bump the table it stops charging and just sits there. I'd say every 5th day I wake up to a dead watch because it didn't charge over night. You would think a Samsung watch on a $80 Samsung watch charger would work better.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Great charger
customer_reviews.text: Love these chargers. No wear and tear on the USB port. A bit expensive compared to others but worth it for the peace of mind that it wont fail or burn my house down.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Cambria

customer_reviews.title: My wireless charging station
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is my Samsung Galaxy Note 10 plus charger arrived when promised. And it is a nice looking unit. The only thing is my Galaxy Note 10Plus is large so I have to lay it on its side but it charges well. I'm giving this 5 stars because of the item arriving on time damage free and works with my phone. I don't purchase anything because of a review some can be biased and others good. This is why in my reviews I write I say don't take my word for it but find out for yourself. But as far as I'm concerned so far so good. And it's made by Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Geo Camp

customer_reviews.title: Same as fast wired charging, not galaxy bud compatible
customer_reviews.text: Fast wireless charges the same as fast wired charging - S10+ Performance Edition Could use a lil wider base bc not all cases will be easy to place in portrait. Not compatible with galaxy buds... huge disappointment since all my samsung wireless chargers support it's small form but this one doesn't, I've tried in all directions, only way I got the red "charging" light to show up on the dock and galaxy buds was to drag it from top to bottom but no charging was being done after 4hrs of waiting and the galaxy buds case was above 50% when placed.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Smith

customer_reviews.title: Couple quirks, but functionally it's excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Great for at home or work (if you have a desk job). Charges quickly and i haven't had any issues with my phone not charging. The cable it comes with is very short so unless you have a power outlet literally right next to where you want to put it (like less than 2 feet) then expect to go buy a longer cable or put it somewhere inconvenient. Don't expect to take it anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Bob S.

customer_reviews.title: Paid for new; received used/refurbished
customer_reviews.text: I immediately noticed the item was resealed and the charging plug was certainly used. As I have said before.... deeply saddened. I rely on this "online platform" for NEW items unless I am shopping in the "new and used" deals, or that it is stated in the description as "Refurbished". So far the unit is working as it should.
customer_reviews.author: U2strategy

customer_reviews.title: Will not work with inteligent charging adaptor!
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it charges my Samsung watch and phone but will work only with the charging adapter that it comes with! I tried at least 5 charging adaptors from different manufactures and all of them were smart chargers and none of them will work with this charging pad!
customer_reviews.author: Leo stask

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Very erratic charging started about the time returning date was reached. I recieved this Samsung Qi certified fast charger pad August 28,2020 and it started getting erratic by th end of September. Now on October 12,2020 it won't charge my Samsung Note 10+ at all. I thought that having an Otter Box cover on the phone might be the problem, but I took it off and it made no difference. I don't recomend buying refurbished products.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald M. Mead

customer_reviews.title: I like this!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for Galaxy 10 and Galaxy Watch. Seems to charge just as good as being directly plugged into the outlet. Watch charges a little bit quicker too. Then the charger that comes with the Galaxy Watch.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Well built, yet not cheap
customer_reviews.text: No doubt that this piece of work is well built by Samsung, once again. Only one thing to note: when charging dual devices, your S10+/Note 10+ will charge much slower. 12w is achieved only when singly charging on the left pad. Very good product generally, yet the price tag is the biggest obstacle for potential buyers. I feel like a price range of $ 40-50 is much more acceptable, though maybe too ideal Update Jan 7, 2019: ONE UI 2.0 just enabled 15w advanced wireless charging on my S10+. Only the left pad is compatible for the new feature
customer_reviews.author: Haoyang Zhou

customer_reviews.title: Decent but not great.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t work well with phones with covers so to ensure it charges you need to take the case off. That’s a pain in the tatas. Also, as with other chargers like this, if it’s not placed on the charger exactly right, it doesn’t charge the phone. Also a pain in the tatas.
customer_reviews.author: Star buyer

customer_reviews.title: Total Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for the simple fact that I own a Samsung Note 8 and my better halve owns a Samsung Note 9 and she is always hogging up my charger cord. Well the charger works well on her phone however the Note 8 it did note work as described by the seller (False Advertisement) in my book. Then I contact the customer service dept and the agent stated item was defective send it back. Well I’m note sending you4 broken item back without you sending me a good unit that works as you have described, I’ll just settle for your bad review and continue to use my cord. A Dissatisfied Customer
customer_reviews.author: Perry Jones

customer_reviews.title: Does not align well with Note 20 ultra
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if I should be writing this for the Phone or the charger. The Note 20 ultra has this missive camera section that sticks out, well because of that and the shape of the Duo 2.0 charger it will not line up correctly. I have to adjust multiple times every time to find the right place to get it to charge. I do not have this issue with smaller chargers, but of course they do not charge as fast (when it works). When I can get the alignment just perfect (like to the 1/32 inch) then it works amazingly well. the rest of the time I get so frustrated I want to....... well ill leave it at that.
customer_reviews.author: Jedi Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Truly a S20 wireless fast charger.
customer_reviews.text: Samsung 15W Fast Charge 2.0 Wireless Charger is about 75% as fast as direct corded Super Fast Charging, and 2X faster than another name brand 3rd party Fast charger. Small foot print and Samsung Quality. Has a small indicator red & green light at the bottom that tells what the charging state is. Well worth the price. Wish they made a travel version for when I travel.
customer_reviews.author: M. Nauman

customer_reviews.title: Good for two devices, but if you have only one device, get one with a stand.
customer_reviews.text: This is great if you have two products (I have a Galaxy and and a Galaxy watch) that you need to charge simultaneously with only one cord. You must use the adapter and even the cord that came with it, or else the device will flash an error light. Also, it seems that the Fast Charge 2.0 isn't any faster than my previous experience with the old fast charge. The only real issue I have with this charger is that the orientations of your devices on the chargers is important, as it is super sensitive and you'll wake up to a not-so-pleasant surprise when you see your phone isn't charged because it wasn't placed precisely.
customer_reviews.author: m. f. manl.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing fast about this charger. Took forever to charge my phone, which got very hot during the process, despite the quiet fan. Will be returning this. My Anker charger is much faster.
customer_reviews.author: Nitenurse

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed and super expensive.
customer_reviews.text: This should get 5 stars but....... The first one i bought was great i use it in my office. The second one I bought its in my bedroom this one is a pain in my you know where. If its not placed exactly in the sweet spot it won't charge and even then I wake up and it stop charging saying the case is to thick. Either I have two of these station and I use them alot, so if anything that I'm saying that there is inconsistencies from charger to charger.
customer_reviews.author: Rzamott

customer_reviews.title: Great Wireless Charger
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to go with my new Galaxy Note 10+. It holds the phone perfectly and charges much faster than the round Samsung convertible wireless charger I purchased two years ago. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Otis Dowdy

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: What I like most is it sits on this stand just right even with my bulky case and always charges through my thick case first time. I feel more comfortable knowing it’s made by Samsung which is why I paid more for it then some cheaper off brands. I have to say it works well and I really like it. I also like that while charging at my desk that I can see the screen perfectly and even use it without taking it off the charger. The stand is well built and the quality materials are immediately evident. Wish list: Would like to see a 25W version like this for my new S20 Ultra
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes a lot of annoying noises
customer_reviews.text: Charges fast even with a case on and I've had no issues with it. However, the charger makes a very annoying high pitched beeping noise when there is no phone on it. When a phone is on it and charging, it switches to making an even louder and more annoying "clicking" like noise from the fan. If you have sensitive hearing and plan to keep this next to your bed I would suggest finding another charger.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but slow going with charge
customer_reviews.text: I have a stand up charger at home and use this one at work with my Samsung Galaxy S9 and Galaxy Watch Active2. Works well out of the box, but charges fairly slow. It says fast charge, but it is mediocre. The USB-C charger it came with was rated at 1.67A or 2A, so I tested with a 3A, but that didn't work at all. Guess I am stuck. I bought this primarily as a secondary charging method for my Active2 and it will do that. From that perspective, it functions. Not worth the higher price, though, if you ask me. I kept it, though, because it is versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Great Samsung Wirless Charger-Works as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: I am using this on my Samsung Note 10 Plus. It works as advertised. It charges with my case cover installed on my phone. Charges very quickly. I am very satisfied with this wireless charger. I just plugged it in and started charging. You can change the fast wireless charging mode on your phone. This effects whether the fan comes on or not when charging your phone with a very low battery charge level.
customer_reviews.author: Wayner

customer_reviews.title: Love it! It's the one for Note20 Ultra 5G
customer_reviews.text: the newest phone from Samsung the Note20 Ultra 5g has a huge battery and for its fast charging (wireless feature) it requires a 15W Qi charger. ALL of the wireless chargers available today are 10W or less. That makes wireless charging an impossible task since the phone will keep cycling on and off the charger and to no avail. This one just came out and it is perfect. It even has a small LED that tells you if it is charging (red) and when it is complete (green). It's great to keep next to you on your desk so you can see the screen! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: drlamarca

customer_reviews.title: For users with hearing loss
customer_reviews.text: The fan that is used to cool the phone while it is being charged emits a very high pitch rhythmic tone. The noise was loud enough to be heard with zoom meeting attendees with a microphone about three feet away.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my office
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of technical work and having wires around for my two phones I can just charge them on this pad. It really does do fast charging on Samsung devices and it rapidly charges iPhones too. I would highly recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, Samsung Leaving Me Sad Again....
customer_reviews.text: To be honest im quite sad at samsung again.... this thing is weak and sad for how much it is, im only keeping it because i got the duo and i charge multiple things but this thing is sad and depressing i have a Note 10 and it took 2 hours to charge it from 43 to 100..... its as bad as the 10 dollar ones so mise will do with those.... dont buy it its a huge waste of cash the charger is way to slow for what they say -update bought another one for a phone that can only wirless charge its fast jow but still not as fast as it should be
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Yes this charges slower then the wall usb plug and should since its lower voltage. I use it at night when i sleep to charge and when i need a quick refresh use wall outlet that came with phone. I am using with a Lg V60 dual screen and this takes twice as long to charge. But compared to generation one charger Samsung made back in 2015 its a speed demon. I charge my LG v40 one generation one and use this for my lg V60. Worked instantly no overheating issues or fail to see phone. I wish i would have bought it a week sooner when it was about 7 dollars cheaper. lol
customer_reviews.author: Michael McDonald

customer_reviews.title: It works, but very touchy with watch
customer_reviews.text: The device works... if you have the right touch. For the phone, it's easy, just plop it on there, the wireless charging starts easily and reliably charges your phone. On the Samsung watch, placement is VERY finicky and I'll often wake up in the morning and my watch stop charging during the night. A slight adjustment of the placement and I get another 10% or so. Wish the watch side worked as well as the phone side. One other note... the watch side seemed to have wear marks on the top of it... as though it had been used. Not sure if Amazon is selling new or used merchandise.
customer_reviews.author: pecocus

customer_reviews.title: Works decent, not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product, because it had the best reviews on youtube, amazon, and online lists for 2019. I expected this product to be excellent due to the price being a bit steep. I tried the product out and was unimpressed. The charge my phone and gear s3 watch took was just as quick as my regular charger. Also, you really have to work to get the watch in the right place to charge. For traveling it is ok. Not as easy to store as a regular wall charger but light weight and as small as can be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Mike.

customer_reviews.title: Right now your only 15w option
customer_reviews.text: So Got this to charge my note 20 and my other half's note 10. Kudos to samsung for including the usb c cord and the new wall adapter. Charger sets up quicly and holds these big phones easily. Charged 2x faster than my previous qi charger. Also recognized and charged the buds + case
customer_reviews.author: S. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Not returnable, if you open box...
customer_reviews.text: The phone fan does not seem to be working, makes no sound at all which makes me believe fan does not work which is why my phone gets too warm while charging on this Samsung device. This item is way too expensive to have a serious glitch like this, especially using it with a 1200 phone. Would NOT reccommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mam

customer_reviews.title: Fast, portable, and convenient!
customer_reviews.text: This dual wireless charging pad is extremely useful! Being able to charge two devices at once (I personally charge my phone along with my galaxy buds or watch) is truly awesome. The fast charging feature of this device quickly charges my accessories and charges my phone (the Galaxy S20) fully in a little over an hour. There is a fan in this device, but I have yet to hear it and have experienced no disturbances. The build quality of this device is very good and sturdy and the overall size is small enough to allow for easy travel. I highly recommend this device!
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Actually Quick Chargers Devices
customer_reviews.text: This product is the best wireless charger you can get for Samsung Galaxy Phones & Samsung Smart Watches & also the Samsung Galaxy Buds /Buds+/Buds Live. Even with bulky cases & OtterBox cases sometimes these wireless charger don't work but I have to say that I haven't found a phone or device with or without case that didn't charge the device wireless. Also another positive thing is that it really does do fast charging.. I've bought a lot of different wireless chargers and most of them don't charge the stuff that quick but the Samsung Wireless 2.0 Fast Charger does actually charge my Samsung Devices quickly
customer_reviews.author: Jay Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great for quick charging my samsung  s7
customer_reviews.text: I felt like my charging port on my older s7 was getting loose and I thought I should get a new phone, but I got this instead and it works like a charm. I didn't realize it was an option for my phone, and would have got one years ago as it saves time not having to re-plug in the charging cord to the phone constantly. It work great in my car also as the phone dose not slide off the charger under normal driving conditions. I also like the vented design to keep the phone from getting hot. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: ann smith

customer_reviews.title: Use it daily
customer_reviews.text: I had an older samsung wireless charger that wouldn't disperse heat efficiently and gave me phone problems. I bought the duo charger for my new note 10 plus and galaxy buds. I'm glad samsung got rid of the annoying brights from their older chargers and replaced them with a simple dim led indicator. This charger charges my phone up very quickly and efficiently. The price seems pretty high but given the fact that I use this literally every night makes it well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Jared DeJong

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended.
customer_reviews.text: While the listing was confusing. (The 2.0 stand) being marked duo style in my order status. I received what I ordered and intended. Works great with my phone case on when placed on the stand. As well as allowing me to use the 25w Samsung wall charger that came packaged with it. If I want to access the super fast charge capability of the S20 FE. Its really only a 15-20 minute difference between using the 25w box to charge vs wireless charging at 15w. Since even super fast charging will revert to 15w once the phone hits above 75% or so.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Cee

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: It’s convenient to be able to set your phone on it and have it charged. It does seem to charge slower but it works. Bought it for my wife because she’s not technologically sound...lol!
customer_reviews.author: Steve J.

customer_reviews.title: Description & Names DO NOT MATCH
customer_reviews.text: SECOND TIME: Ordered the DUO pictured second with the flat table device with two circles. 2nd time I get the 1st picture of the STAND - the website pictures and descriptions do not match up at all AND IT IS A CRAP SHOOT AS TO WHAT WILL SHOW UP. FRUSTRATED AT A SECOND RETURN.
customer_reviews.author: Dana R.

customer_reviews.title: Great, until it stopped working after 7 months
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this charger and appreciated how it worked with my thick phone case still on. Unfortunately after 7 months it started flashing an amber light and stopped charging. I haven't been able to get it working again. I used it as specified, and only used the original wall charger and cord provided until the point I had to troubleshoot. For this price I expect it to last much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought the wireless charger stand a month ago (09/18/20) and it worked great. My first wireless charger. The charger stopped working today (10/20/20). The eligible return from Amazon was 10/19/20. I don't know what went wrong with the charger. I really liked it. I'm very disappointed that it just stopped working. Amazon was great and offered a free return and full refund of $55.00. I"m thankful for the refund. I don't have money to throw away.
customer_reviews.author: YJ

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed with reliability
customer_reviews.text: For some reason, this charger doesn't seem to work reliably all the time. Many times I have put my phone (s10 5g) & watch (active 2) on the pads. It makes a noise like it recognize device & charging. But in morning, my battery has not been charged. I do not have this issue with other Samsung & 3rd party chargers. But I like having one device on stand that can charge both.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed and returning
customer_reviews.text: I was really optimistic about this little device for my Note 8 and Galaxy Active 2 Watch. Unfortunately, it doesn't charge them both consistently. I've used it for about 2 weeks and have found that a) it's difficult to position either device properly so that they will charge and b) I've awakened multiple times and one or the other of the devices has not charged. Returning and looking for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Joey L.

customer_reviews.title: Simple, easy and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Edited.... I use this at home to charge my Galaxy S9 + and my Samsung Galaxy Watch. It definitely delivers fast charging. Just set your phone/s and or watch on it and it quickly shows that it is charging. I started using it in my Motorhome while traveling. It is a superb product for home and travel. Simple, easy and convenient.
customer_reviews.author: WolfSpyryt (Terry A Zahn)

customer_reviews.title: it's good but it has its points to improve
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to use, but over time it costs to charge the smartwatch, not because of charging time, but rather, because of the position of how the smartwatch should be, it is a bit tedious but passable. I do not recommend it for trips, since it is very large and you must have the charger itself, if you lose the charger you will not be able to use it with another one, in short, you must improve the wireless charging pads for the smartwatch, to The cell phone is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Hector Alonso Mendez Orantes

customer_reviews.title: One hour difference between wall charger and this pad
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to migrate to a wireless charger and was hoping that this pad would charge my phone just as fast the wall charger does. This will be going back after I just got it. I plugged it in and put my phone on top if to charge. It showed a 2 hour ETA to charge my phone from 25% while cable charging only takes an estimated 1 hour. How this a fast a charger if the cable charger from my phone charges faster than this pad?
customer_reviews.author: Erbin Outfitters

customer_reviews.title: Makes charging so much easier
customer_reviews.text: With this Duo charger I can easily fast wireless charge my S9+ along with my Watch Active2 or my Buds+. This charger is also USB-C which is nice as prior wireless chargers were still micro USB. The only thing really that would make this item better is if it had more status LED's of different colors, this unit has two small LED's in the middle and sometimes it's hard to see them depending on how you're looking at the unit. My old wireless charger would glow green completely around the base of the unit when it was fully charged.
customer_reviews.author: Steve-O

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: These Samsung Galaxy buds and charging stand are amazing. I love the quality of the sound and the long lasting charge it has. I can listen to my music and also make and receive phone calls and receive my notifications as well. I really love how it announces the name of the caller when receiving a call. With the charging port, I can use to charge my cell. Having these ear buds has made my life easier
customer_reviews.author: Tresha M. Lane

customer_reviews.title: Incredible wireless charger.
customer_reviews.text: Let me tell you, coming from an iphone xs max to an s20 ultra, I had no idea wireless charging could be this fast! This wireless charger (15w) is almost as fast as my iphones "fast" charging (18w) via a cable. I used to think wireless charging was useless since iphones only have pathetic 5 watt wireless charging, but now with speeds like this I use it all the time!
customer_reviews.author: bobby smith

customer_reviews.title: Samsung should have made the pad wider!
customer_reviews.text: This is nice but I wish they would have made the placement pad wider. The pad is so specific to the size of the phone or watch that it's not placed right on the spot, it will not work or it will start but cut off before you even realize it. It's very annoying, Samsung should have known better than to build a product like this. Just a bit wider sensors/coils would have made a huge difference.
customer_reviews.author: VicThor

customer_reviews.title: Charges fast
customer_reviews.text: It charges my s10+ and galaxy watch quickly and without problems. My older samsung wireless charger likes to stop charging randomly, this one doesn't do that. I like that I can charge both my watch and phone off one cord and in one place. Although the cord it comes with was way too short for me to use and considering the price that it is I think they could at least put one a little bit longer. Nonetheless I would never go back to wired charging, just seems like too much of a hassle now.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Seth

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I am using this for both Samsung Galaxy Note 8 and 20 Ultra, both with cases and it charges great. If it doesn't sit flush you need to repostion to get the right connection usually in Vertical position and which type of case I have on either phone, which it isn't a problem for me. Horizontal sits flush so far with all of my cases even fairly bulky ones.
customer_reviews.author: Jacca

customer_reviews.title: so much better for traveling
customer_reviews.text: I love this at home not going to lie, but it is even better for traveling, no need to pack a bunch of charging cords and using several different outlets, just put my phone and watch on it when i go to bed easy peasy, my daughter used it to charge her wiresless earbuds as well.. and i have never actually heard the fan so it didn't bother me at all. But I am glad it is there!!!
customer_reviews.author: Misty Neal

customer_reviews.title: Does not charge correclty
customer_reviews.text: You have to get your phone on this charger just right or you will wake up to a dead phone. The other charging port also does not work correctly for my Samsung watch. This is the second one of these I received. The first one had a power issue and the red light continued. The second one powers on but you never know if you will have a charged phone or a dead phone.
customer_reviews.author: Jay290000

customer_reviews.title: Not as Advertised in Description
customer_reviews.text: This product is falsely advertised. You can not control the light and/or fan at all, even though it states you can. The fan is very subtle but does not do what it's intended for. I had my phone in the stand for not even 10min and my phone is overheated now. Do no waste your money or time on this product. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I am satisfied with this product. It is the actual Samsung unit and it performs as described. Was also $10 cheaper than the local store.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Nowak

customer_reviews.title: Generally great product, occasional lack of connection
customer_reviews.text: It's a pleasure to not have to plug in my phone and have the port wear out over time. Not sure if this is a problem for all such chargers, but sometimes the phone doesn't align properly and won't charge overnight. A few times I had to unplug and plug back in the charger for it to make a connection with the phone, but generally it works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: lgodiva

customer_reviews.title: Generally works great.
customer_reviews.text: I keep my charger on my night stand and use it to charge both my phone and watch. However, I have to perfectly align the watch on the small charger to get it to work. There have been a few occasions when I placed my Samsung Galaxy watch on the charger and had both the charger and the watch indicate that it was charging only to wake up in the morning to see that the watch did not charge. Fortunately the watch will last 2 days on a charge.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff W.

customer_reviews.title: Works good, if using in car may need a stronger USB power source.
customer_reviews.text: Product is great when properly powered. In my case, have S7 with an Outerbox case (which is thick and makes many wire chargers not work). In car using supplied cord plugged into car USB, would not work. Using a higher powered 3rd party USB converter it worked.
customer_reviews.author: NJ Person

customer_reviews.title: Great Charger!
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste time shopping for the cheaper option when it almost never holds up to expectations. This device will charge my phone quite fast even through an Otterbox Case. Wireless charging isn't quite as fast as corded fast charging options but though slightly slower this is quite close for comparable charging speeds as wired. I am quite impressed with this device.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Did not function properly right out of the box- and before anyone says I don't know how to use it properly I am telling you now that this was the SECOND unit I bought (the first one was from Samsung directly) and one side did not charge at all. The Samsung purchased unit charges on both sides singly and simultaneously.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The QI charge zones are beyond finicky. If this wasn’t a gift I would absolutely hate it. Multiple time I’ve woken up to a dead phone because my phone was millimeters to far left I don’t even want to try to explain my frustration with the watch pad Please don’t waist your time with this product. Samsung honestly dropped the ball
customer_reviews.author: Newtb88

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Does everything it says in description!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Site right by my bed. Fast charges my Note 10 plus. My wife has an IPhone and that charges as well. The LED light is not too bright when the lights are off so it won't bother you at night and you don't even hear the fan, comes with a Samsung fast charge wall plug and a very short type-C to type-C cable. Another great Samsung product!
customer_reviews.author: Felipe M.

customer_reviews.title: save your money on Prime membership
customer_reviews.text: The charger itself is very high quality, as you would expect from Samsung, and is working perfectly. This would have been a 5 star review if this wasn't the second order in a row where Amazon promised 1 day delivery then changed it to 2-3 day delivery the next day. I don't understand why prime members are paying those fees and then are subjected to bait and switch advertising on delivery times. Walmart.com has never sent me an order late but since Amazon started its own Prime delivery service, being late by a day or two or even three is the new norm.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs K

customer_reviews.title: Huge Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I am usually a huge Samsung fan. I have all Samsung products, and love all of them. But this does not fall under that category. The fan inside this wireless charger makes a very audible clicking noise. At its worst, I can hear it from almost two meters away. This is especially annoying when trying to sleep, since I use this to charge my phone on my night stand, as most people would. Not to mention the cable is so short, it can barely reach off my nightstand to the power strip right beneath it. Overall, this is not a product I would recommend to anybody.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: That was a bummer!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about this product after researching online to find the best charger for my Galaxy S20 and Active 2 watch. However, this failed miserably and Samsung support was no help either. It took over 4hrs to fully charge my phone from 20% when the charger that comes with the phone takes 1.5hrs. When it put both devices on the pad, it was at a snail's pace. I'm not sure if the device was damaged or it didn't support my phone. All Samsung could tell me is that it should work. I'm returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Sadiyah Mellett

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly, even with a case on the phone
customer_reviews.text: After trying (like a fool) several off brand wireless chargers, and throwing them in the trash, I finally bought the good stuff. Works perfectly, even with my Otterbox case on it. Immediately after seeing how well it performed, I ordered one for the wife.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only Single Charge
customer_reviews.text: It seems that every Samsung ft chrger, ncluding this duo, fails to change. Phone quits charging after a minute sometimes less than a minute. Concept is great but prefer it to truly work. Tried reaching out to Samsung support and that was a fail also. The watch side for charging was not an issue. This, warranting the 1 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Leticia Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working After 2 Months
customer_reviews.text: Worked fantastically for the first 2 months. Now it suddenly won't register my husbands phone (Samsung note 10), watch (Samsung Galaxy watch), or ear buds (Samsung Galaxy buds plus) are placed on it to charge. On the few occasions it does start charging them, it will stop charging them within 10 minutes. I expected much more from Samsung, especially for a $70 charger.
customer_reviews.author: MommyGrabs

customer_reviews.title: great charge fast
customer_reviews.text: tried it out and worked great right out of the box. charged very quickly. hope this helps the phone last longer.
customer_reviews.author: R. Canfield

customer_reviews.title: Actually Read lol
customer_reviews.text: First of all, ordered this Monday the 17th with two day shipping and it got here Tuesday the 18th, so I'm already impressed! I saw a lot of negative reviews mention the fan and noise. As soon as I set my phone on the charging pad it came up with this notification specifically talking about it. Literally says it can cause fan noises, and scheduling it makes it so it doesn't bother you with the fan. Read your notifications y'all lol you look dumb.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Leciejewski

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed
customer_reviews.text: There have been nights it's great. I like that it only charges until full. But there are nights it doesn't work at all or starts charging and stops. It's inconsistent.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Not a Bran New Product
customer_reviews.text: Charger stand works as deascribed. But it is definitely not a new item. Box has 2 layers of "sealed" stickers. See attached photos. Seems to be refurbished, which is good as new!
customer_reviews.author: Alvin B.

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I imagined it would be be. Fits my galaxy note10 plus well. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: R. Barr

customer_reviews.title: Best Charger
customer_reviews.text: This Charger is fast, charges with a case on, has a sleek design, and is easy to maintain. There is no guesswork on centering phone when placing phone in horizontal or vertical positions. Price is slightly higher then other chargers, but with the rapid charge time, I find it worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: DENISE GONZALEZ

customer_reviews.title: Continues to charge even after phone is fully charged
customer_reviews.text: While slower than charging when plugged in, it is simple to use. Biggest problem, and why I gave it one star, once the battery is fully charged, the charger continues to charge, as the phone remains warm well after the battery hits 100%. This does not occur with the phone when it is plugged in. Avoid, as this will shorten battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth The Money
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. The description said it's a fast charger. It definitely is not. It's very slow and has no power whatsoever. I have a old wire that's years old and is faster. The only good thing is that while charging it stands up right and you watch something while charging without holding it
customer_reviews.author: K. W. R.

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional for Note 10+/5G
customer_reviews.text: As I would expect from samsung, it gets the job done. Having a note 10+/5G is not easy and finding a fast charger for this monster is also not easy. So far, this has been the best fast charger for the Note 20+/5G I have found.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael O. Navarro

customer_reviews.title: Great to charge phone,galxy buds, and watch only.
customer_reviews.text: So this works fine but I notice after few months my galaxy buds stop charging on the main pad..sucks idk if it's due to a software issue but it still charges the phone??? So if your charging phone and watch yes a good buy but if your using the galaxy buds seek alternative. **Update i got the new galaxy buds and it works for both now!!
customer_reviews.author: kaykay

customer_reviews.title: Fast Charge Everytime
customer_reviews.text: Although I have an iPhone, this works well on it. I love the 45 degree angle that the phone sits on so it's not sitting down on your table, it's up where you can still see it. I have one on my nightstand and one in my office. Always good for a fast and reliable charge. Just make sure you really fit it in at the right spot. Sometimes you can think you have it on there charging but you may be off just a little bit. Nothing that's going to make me ding the rating as it's user error.
customer_reviews.author: ridetheairwaves

customer_reviews.title: Terrible unless you like puzzles
customer_reviews.text: Great idea I guess, just failed on execution. it is a fight every single day to get the phone and watch to line up and charge on this thing. they have to be in a perfect spot, and that spot seems to change daily. Sometimes you may get them to start charging only to wake up in the middle of the night to dead batterys because they spot to charge them on magically changed. don't waste your time with this thing.
customer_reviews.author: kfolden1

customer_reviews.title: Its convenient
customer_reviews.text: It is very picky on what it works with. I have many other usb cables and usb wall outlets in my house, but it only works if you use it with the samsung wall plug that has the fast charge built on. This makes it an bit inflexible in how/where you can use it. It charges much slower than just using the a cable, but that's fine for me because I got it for the convenience of not needing to fumble around for a cable while in the dark to charge my phone before I go to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

product_meta.title: Samsung Qi Certified Fast Charge Wireless Charger Pad (2019 Edition) with Cooling Fan for Galaxy Phones, Watches and Apple Iphone Devices - US Version
product_meta.description: Style:Pad| Color:BlackPlugging in your smartphone is no longer required. Simply place the back of your Qi Compatible device on the charging pad and power up without connecting the device to a port or cable. With Samsung fast charge you can charge your Samsung Galaxy smartphone with up to 9W power output and even charge your Samsung smartwatch.
feature_bullets: Supports wireless charging on all Qi universal standard smartphones. Qi certified by wireless power Consortium (WPC). Qi certified for Tested and safe wireless charging. Works with Qi compatible smartphones including Galaxy Note10, Note10+, S10, Note9, Apple iphone8, iPhone x, iPhone 11.
Charges Galaxy Buds and gear S3 or later Samsung smartwatches.
Led light control. Power on/off using your Galaxy phone.
Us version includes 1 year manufacturer warranty, USB-C wall charger

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars7,543 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Wall Charger, USB-C Cable, Wireless charger
